TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ralph_Beard, title = Ralph_Beard, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Beard} }

S.FORM: Ralph Beard sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA. kawas tay 1927, ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 12, Ralph Beard, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2007) cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Ralph Beard sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA. kawas tay 1927, ryax sa tay 2 nqo tay 12, Ralph Beard, sqoliq na p'onro. (mhoqil sa kawas tay 2007) cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
